LanguageData.VPE_EnchantQuality.label: enchant quality
LanguageData.VPE_EnchantQuality.description: The caster concentrates on an item and attempts to improve its quality by reshaping the material slightly, but cannot imitate a master’s handiwork.
LanguageData.VPE_Mend.label: mend
LanguageData.VPE_Mend.description: The caster concentrates on an item and attempts to repair present damage by rebinding the material, with the effect scaling with their psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_ConjureHeatPearls.label: conure heat pearls
LanguageData.VPE_ConjureHeatPearls.description: Converts a minimum amount of the caster’s heat into metaphysical pearls. These can be thrown at other psycasters to induce massive amounts of heat on them, but are otherwise harmless.
LanguageData.VPE_Haywire.label: haywire
LanguageData.VPE_Haywire.description: Designates an area to experience psychic interference, effectively scrambling electronic systems’ IFFs while identifying the caster’s people as allies. Duration scales with psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_Power.label: power
LanguageData.VPE_Power.description: Metaphysically alters the designated equipment’s power input to extract energy directly from fluctuations in the quantum foam for a few days. Duration scales with psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_RockConstruct.label: rock construct
LanguageData.VPE_RockConstruct.description: Converts a minimum amount of the caster’s heat capacity into metaphysical crystals to be implanted into a stone chunk. This new rock construct is capable of performing simple chores, and breaking the crystal allows the heat capacity to be restored.
LanguageData.VPE_SteelConstruct.label: steel construct
LanguageData.VPE_SteelConstruct.description: Converts a minimum amount of the caster’s heat capacity into metaphysical crystals to be implanted into a steel slag. This new steel construct will follow the caster and defend them from harm, and breaking the crystal allows the heat capacity to be restored.
LanguageData.VPE_CraftPsyRing.label: craft psyring
LanguageData.VPE_CraftPsyRing.description: Psychically alters the form of a piece of eltex into the shape of a ring, which is imbued with psycasting knowledge of the caster. When worn by another psycaster, this temporarily allows them to use this knowledge to perform the stored psycast without practice.
LanguageData.VPE_WordofProgress.label: word of progress
LanguageData.VPE_WordofProgress.description: Speak words encouraging problem solving capabilities while psychically hypercharging the target’s mind with keen insight. The target will experience double research speed and intellectual skill gain for 5 days, scaling with their psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VPE_ReverseEngineer.label: reverse engineer
LanguageData.VPE_ReverseEngineer.description: The caster concentrates on an object and attempts to unravel the knowledge needed to manufacture more of them. The long, intense concentration ends with the caster falling into a 6-hour coma.
